page.title: 13Mayor-Bolton by Bowland
page.content: Mrs Lilburn is the mayor of the Ribble Valley.She is the chief citizen of the Ribble Valley.Mr Christopher Lilburn is her consort.She lives in the village. She visits schools, people's homes and garden parties. Before she became the mayor she was a councillor for Lancashire County Council and a Conservative Politician.She is also a member of our Parish Council. Mrs Lilburn will try to improve facilities for deaf people in her year of office. She is the chairman of many different committees.{
